messages.message: i see a commercial trial modal thatâ€™s causing `aihub-templates` to fail in my CI run (https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/12454/overview/d1a7b16e-fbde-4f9c-a333-1050dcc59e50/replay?roarHideRunsWithDiffGroupsAndTags=1&ts=1721802032776.2&att=1) - has anyone else seen this?
maybe i need to delete the `<mailto:cypress-org-admin-59958@instabase.com|cypress-org-admin-59958@instabase.com>` user and rerun the Cypress test? @Xindi Xu
Yea, I ran into this yesterday as well. I can extend the trial license in metronome for this org.
Done. Added a new plan. @Serena can you try rerunning Cypress again
If we see this issue more often, we can consider extending *`aihub_commercial_free_trial_duration`* . Rn, it's set to 14 so we'd run into this 7 days after PR's creation date

ah not every engineer has permissions to extend the license in metronome, right? i was wondering if we should add these instructions to the cypress on-call runbook (https://docs.google.com/document/d/1_YIkXbxu7NE9FD5SQlJs5qj114LD-6yK__-qMA3sWis/edit?pli=1)

increasing `aihub_commercial_free_trial_duration` for just crafting-cyp makes sense and sounds like a better approach though!
Added to the doc for now!
